Loader (to show component click to the button below)

```js
const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = React.useState(false);

<div>
  <button
    type="button"
    onClick={() => {
      setIsLoading(true);
      setTimeout(() => setIsLoading(false), 1000);
    }}
  >
    Show loader
  </button>
  <Loader isLoading={isLoading} />
</div>;
```
